Message:
Everything started when
I was placed in charge of
a certain experiment
at the Academy.

The Academy was
expecting big things.
It was the one thing
I couldn’t afford to mess up.

But, my new medicine made
to accelerate plant growth
did the exact opposite—it killed
all the plants in the school.

I desperately clung to the teacher
as they tried to leave.

“Please, just give me
one more chance!
I’ll get it right this time
for sure! I promise!”

In place of a response,
all I received in answer
was the cold, booming slam
of a closing door.

Their decision was clear.
My dismissal from the Academy
was all but confirmed.

Seeing me collapsed on the ground,
tears pouring from my eyes,
a lone girl reached out
her hand to me.

Lifting my head, I saw her
break into a gentle smile.

“Say, tell me.
How do you feel right now?”

Huh...? Who the hell does
this girl think she is...?
